sqlMap.select:
select ID as id, C_AIRCOMCODE as aircomcode, C_AIRCOMCNNAME as aircomcnname, C_AIRCOMJNAME as aircomjname, C_AIRCOMENNAME as aircomenname, C_AIRCOMLOGO as aircomlogo, C_AIRCOMDESC as aircomdesc, C_CREATEUSER as createuser, C_CREATETIME as createtime, C_MODIFYUSER as modifyuser, C_MODIFYTIME as modifytime, C_ISENABLE as isenable, C_UCODE as ucode, C_ISAIR as isair, C_LANGUAGE as language, C_COUNTRYCODE as countrycode
from T_AIRCOMPANY where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_AIRCOMPANY ( ID, C_AIRCOMCODE, C_AIRCOMCNNAME, C_AIRCOMJNAME, C_AIRCOMENNAME, C_AIRCOMLOGO, C_AIRCOMDESC, C_CREATEUSER, C_CREATETIME, C_MODIFYUSER, C_MODIFYTIME, C_ISENABLE, C_UCODE, C_ISAIR, C_LANGUAGE, C_COUNTRYCODE ) values (
#id#,
#aircomcode#,
#aircomcnname#,
#aircomjname#,
#aircomenname#,
#aircomlogo#,
#aircomdesc#,
#createuser#,
#createtime#,
#modifyuser#,
#modifytime#,
#isenable:DECIMAL#,
#ucode:DECIMAL#,
#isair:DECIMAL#,
#language:DECIMAL#,
#countrycode#
)
sqlMap.update:
update T_AIRCOMPANY set C_AIRCOMCODE = #aircomcode#, C_AIRCOMCNNAME = #aircomcnname#, C_AIRCOMJNAME = #aircomjname#, C_AIRCOMENNAME = #aircomenname#, C_AIRCOMLOGO = #aircomlogo#, C_AIRCOMDESC = #aircomdesc#, C_CREATEUSER = #createuser#, C_CREATETIME = #createtime#, C_MODIFYUSER = #modifyuser#, C_MODIFYTIME = #modifytime#, C_ISENABLE = #isenable:DECIMAL#, C_UCODE = #ucode:DECIMAL#, C_ISAIR = #isair:DECIMAL#, C_LANGUAGE = #language:DECIMAL#, C_COUNTRYCODE=#countrycode#
where ID = #id#
